__e: I played bridge with his mother.
I know a guy who was arrested for plotting to bring down the Brooklyn Bridge with a blowtorch.
I used to play bridge with my mother in her bedroom.
Jimmy, one of the lads heard you saying that Mr de Valera let you down at the Mount Street Bridge battle, and that he lost his nerve over in Kilmainham?
Back then we used to call it the East River Bridge. "Fit to be good for jumping," we'd say.
We tried to get out of the city, and we took the Brooklyn Bridge, and we were right there when it hit.
